about_the_game:
It’s the year 2004 and this is the future — a dystopian future under the iron grip of the Queen of Ice. A revolution is brewing. As the Simplest Office Clerk, you are sent with yet another message to the Queen. Will you make it to the Palace? Will you choose to side with the Queen, or ultimately join the Revolution? What price are you willing to pay?

AbstractPunk is a wild, punk, soulslike game featuring unique collage-style graphics. Collect ice from defeated enemies, fight your way through a country engulfed in revolution and try to find your place in broken future of the year 2004.

Use happiness against your enemies. They will be happy.

AbstractPunk is a one-of-a-kind first-person game that fuses a dynamic mix of genres, including soulslike, boomer FPS, 3D platforming, RPG, and roguelike. Dive into a world of chaotic, collage-style graphics and abstract art elements, all set to an original soundtrack that pairs energetic, catchy songs with a raw punk spirit. AbstractPunk isn't just a game—it's a bold, immersive journey that defies expectations, delivering a visceral, visually explosive adventure. Get ready for fast-paced combat, thrilling platforming and a relentless drive that will keep you coming back for more.

Game Features:

  • Radical gameplay

  • No forgiveness

  • Collect ice

  • Level up

  • Traverse the totalitarian world of 2004

  • Never give up

  • Collect faces

  • Fall and rise again

  • Shoot happiness

  • Go to the Palace of the Queen of Ice

  • Decide the fate of the world

  • Rich and unique soundtrack

  • Punk, post-punk, electro-punk, synth-punk, electroclash, and more

  • Songs!
